author: Lesley Waters
method: Divide the blueberries between two glass dessert dishes.  In a bowl, mix together the Greek-style yoghurt and whipped cream and spoon over the top of the blueberries.  Sprinkle the soft brown sugar over the top of the cream mixture and set aside for ten minutes so the sugar can soak into the cream.  Serve.
